entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
